location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to the Marine Officer Commanding on the Bahrain Station, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing a duplicate despatch to be delivered directly to the Senior Officer as quickly as possible, wherever he may be.
